title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Program for Multicultural Workforce

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Web-based course designed to help culturally diverse learners acquire workplace language skills, accessible via mobile devices in BYOD environments, with customized content considering cultural differences

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic workplace language communication skills with 80% accuracy within one week
Learners can utilize three or more appropriate language expressions for business scenarios considering diverse cultural contexts
Learners can voluntarily participate in learning via mobile platforms five or more times per week, achieving a completion rate of 90% or higher
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
